$DOT   /USDT Technical Analysis Executive Summary Polkadot (DOT) is currently in a bearish trend on the provided chart. The price action shows a downtrend with lower highs and lower lows, and it is trading below its key Exponential Moving Averages (EMAs). The Relative Strength Index (RSI) is also in bearish territory, indicating a lack of buying momentum. However, fundamental data suggests a strong underlying project with significant market capitalization, which could support a recovery in the long term. Key levels to watch include recent lows for support and previous highs for resistance.   See full analysis on https://www.cexscan.com/technical-analyses/dotusdt-technical-analysis-202601160315
